data.title: The Problem of Evolution on Orbital Resonance
data.meta_description: In order to understand the orbital resonant action on the dynamic evolution, it is necessary to investigate the resonant characteristic present in a long period of time. The variation in the characteristic is numerically studied for three kinds of orbital resonances,...
